tellolib.camera

Interface TelloCameraInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TelloCamera

    public interface TelloCameraInterface
    Convenience functions for Tello camera.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a target rectangle to be drawn on the camera feed images.

      Add a target rectangle to be drawn on the camera feed images.

      Returns recording state.

      Set an array of MatOfPoint vectors, one vector for each contour to be drawn on the camera feed images.
      void setStatusBar(java.lang.String message)
      Set a string of data to be displayed across the bottom of the video feed.
      boolean startRecording(java.lang.String folder)
      Turn on recording of the video feed to an .avi file in the named folder.

      Start capture of video stream from drone for processing by this program.
      void stopRecording()

      void stopVideoCapture()
      Stop video stream capture thread.
      boolean takePicture(java.lang.String folder)
      Save the current image from the video feed to a file in the named folder.

    • Method Detail

      • startVideoCapture

        void startVideoCapture(boolean liveWindow)
        Start capture of video stream from drone for processing by this program. This function may take several seconds to complete.
        Parameters:
        liveWindow - True to display video feed in a live window.

      • stopVideoCapture

        void stopVideoCapture()
        Stop video stream capture thread.

      • takePicture

        boolean takePicture(java.lang.String folder)
        Save the current image from the video feed to a file in the named folder.
        Parameters:
        folder - Location to save image.
        Returns:
        True if image saved, false if failed.

      • startRecording

        boolean startRecording(java.lang.String folder)
        Turn on recording of the video feed to an .avi file in the named folder.
        Parameters:
        folder - Location to save the video file.
        Returns:
        True if recording started, false if failed.

      • stopRecording

        void stopRecording()
        Stop recording the video feed.

      • isRecording

        boolean isRecording()
        Returns recording state.
        Returns:
        True if recording in progress, false if not.

      • getImage

        org.opencv.core.Mat getImage()
        Returns the current image from the video feed.
        Returns:
        The current image.

      • addTarget

        void addTarget(org.opencv.core.Rect target)
        Add a target rectangle to be drawn on the camera feed images. Width of lines defaults to 1 pixel, color defaults to 0,0,255 (red).
        Parameters:
        target - Rectangle to draw, null to clear all rectangles.

      • addTarget

        void addTarget(org.opencv.core.Rect target,
               int width,
               org.opencv.core.Scalar color)
        Add a target rectangle to be drawn on the camera feed images.
        Parameters:
        target - Rectangle to draw, null to clear all rectangles.
        width - Pixel width of rectangle lines.
        color - Set the line color used to draw rectangles. B,G,R color values.

      • setContours

        void setContours(java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> contours)
        Set an array of MatOfPoint vectors, one vector for each contour to be drawn on the camera feed images. Each vector can contains as many points as needed to draw the contour.
        Parameters:
        contours - Array of MatOfPoint objects, one for each contour, null to clear all contours.

      • setContours

        void setContours(java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> contours,
                 int width,
                 org.opencv.core.Scalar color)
        Set an array of MatOfPoint vectors, one vector for each contour to be drawn on the camera feed images. Each vector can contains as many points as needed to draw the contour.
        Parameters:
        contours - Array of MatOfPoint objects, one for each contour, null to clear all contours.
        width - Pixel width of rectangle lines.
        color - Set the line color used to draw rectangles. B,G,R color values.

      • setStatusBar

        void setStatusBar(java.lang.String message)
        Set a string of data to be displayed across the bottom of the video feed.
        Parameters:
        message - The data to be displayed or null to clear.
